com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.search

Interface FindRelatedConceptsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FindRelatedConceptsServiceImpl

    public interface FindRelatedConceptsService
    Service representing the FindRelatedConcepts API

    • Method Detail

      • findRelatedConceptsWithText

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithText(String text,
                                       FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts matching query text using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithText

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithText(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                       String text,
                                       FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts matching query text using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use to authenticate the request
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithReference

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithReference(String reference,
                                            FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text from an object store object using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        reference - An HP Haven OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithReference

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithReference(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                            String reference,
                                            FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text from an object store object using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use to authenticate the request
        reference - An HP Haven OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithUrl

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithUrl(String url,
                                      FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                        throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text from a url using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithUrl

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithUrl(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                      String url,
                                      FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                        throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text from a url using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use to authenticate the request
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findRelatedConceptsWithFile

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithFile(File file,
                                       FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text in a file using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        file - A file containing the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request

        List<Entity> findRelatedConceptsWithFile(byte[] bytes,
                                       FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Query HP Haven OnDemand for related concepts using query text in a file using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes of a file containing the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of related concepts that match the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException
